name: World Math Challenges (Pro): Kids Mind Game
name_original: World Math Challenges (Pro): Kids Mind Game
description:
The SkyBlitz Studio presents World Math Challenges: a highly polished app that helps kids practice addition, subtraction, multiplication and division at an elementary level. As the student practices math, they are awarded points for correct answers.

"This is a beautifully crafted, kid-friendly math supplement for kids tackling basic math. I give it two thumbs up and look forward to more great updates in the future."

- App Advice

Math Academy features:

- Configurable mini games for addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
- Multiple game modes
- Time trial mode: 45 seconds to answer as many questions as you can!
- Endurance mode: how long can you go without making a mistake?
- High score screen for each mode
- Three difficulty configurations for each mode
- A vibrant, easy to use interface
- Cute music and sound effects

If you like the quality of our app please be sure to write us a quick review. Reviews will help us grow and allow us to further invest in educational app development.
